TEXT.TITLE: ALLIED-SIGNAL <ALD> SELLS TO SCHLUMBERGER <SLB>
TEXT.BODY: Allied-Signal Inc and Schlumberger Ltd jointly announced that Schlumberger had acquired Allied-Signal's Neptune International unit. Terms weren't disclosed. Atlanta, Ga.-based Neptune, which makes water meters and flow measurement equipment, had sales last year of 80 mln dlrs. Reuter
